sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 751.011 Definitions.—As used in this chapter, the term:

sections.heading: for temporary or concurrent custody; contents.
sections.text: for temporary or concurrent custody; contents.

sections.heading: copies of the child’s records, held by third parties, that are necessary for the care of the child, including, but not limited to:
sections.text: copies of the child’s records, held by third parties, that are necessary for the care of the child, including, but not limited to:

sections.heading: As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Concurrent custody” means that an eligible extended family member is awarded custodial rights to care for a child concurrently with the child’s parent or parents
